description.en: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.ar: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.br: Escolha o Peru que deseja receber! Cada item fornece +50% de experiência e +30 de um atributo por 60 minutos. Não pode ser utilizado juntamente de Pergaminhos de Amplificação, Elixires ou Frascos.
description.cns: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.de: Wähle zwischen einem Red, Green, Blue oder Yellow Turkey! Jedes Item gibt +50% EXP und +30 Stat für eine Stunde. Lässt sich nicht mit Scroll of Experience ES, Medicine oder Flask kombinieren.
description.fi: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.fil: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.fr: Choisissez si vous souhaitez recevoir de la Dinde Rouge, Verte, Bleue ou Jaune ! Chaque objet augmente le gain d'expérience de 50% et les stats de +30 pendant une heure. Ne se cumule pas avec les effets du Parchemin Spécial d'Amplification, des Elixirs ou des Flasques.
description.id: Pilih untuk menerima Red, Blue atau Yellow Turkey! Tiap item memberikan +50% Exp dan +30 Stat untuk 1 jam. Tidak bisa ditumpuk dengan Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir maupun Flask.
description.it: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.jp: 受け取りたい赤、緑、青、または黄色の七面鳥を選択してください! 各アイテムは、+50% Exp と +30 ステータス を 1 時間提供します。戦神の巻物ES、秘薬、強力な秘薬とは重複できません。
description.kr: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.nl: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.pl: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.ru: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.sp: ¡Elija si desea recibir un Pavo Rojo, Verde, Azul o Amarillo! Cada elemento proporciona +50% Exp y +30 Stat por 1 hora. No se acumula con Pergamino Amplificador ES, Elixir ni Frasco.
description.sw: Select if you want to receive a Red, Green, Blue or Yellow Turkey! Each item provides +50% Exp and a +30 Stat for 1 hour. Does not stack with Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir nor Flask.
description.th: เลือกว่าคุณต้องการรับ Red, Green, Blue หรือ Yellow Turkey! แต่ละรายการมอบ +50% Exp และ +30 Stat เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง ไม่สามารถใช้ร่วมกับ Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir หรือ Flask
description.tw: 如果您想收到紅色、綠色、藍色或黃色火雞，請選擇！ 每件物品提供 +50% 經驗 和 +30 素質，持續 1 小時。 不與經驗加成卷軸、藥水或秘藥疊加。
description.vi: Chọn xem bạn muốn nhận Red, Green, Blue hay Yellow Turkey! Mỗi vật phẩm cung cấp +50% Exp và +30 Stat trong 1 giờ. Không cộng dồn với Scroll of Amplification ES, Elixir hay Flask.
